name: YDRENAS COMMUNICATIONS AB
goal: Bolagets verksamhet är konsultverksamhet i form av analys, rådgivning och operativa insatser inom samhällsfrågor och kommunikation samt publicistisk verksamhet och därmed förenlig verksamhet.
interests: Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation
euInitiatives: Capital Markets Union, Insurance Distribution Directive, IDD, MiFID2, IORP2, EMIR Refit, Pan-european Personal Pensions Product, PEPP, Solvency II Directive, CCP Recovery and Resolution, CRR/CRD, Sustainable finance, Fintech, CSDR, ESA review, Brexit.
